item.description: This is your chance to check out and play with TI's low cost Launchpad platform, and play with the also low cost capacitive touch booster pack. Here's a description of the booster pack: DESCRIPTION: The Capacitive Touch BoosterPack is a complete hardware and software reference design for implementing touch sensing capabilities using an MSP430G2xx Value Line microcontroller device! The plugin board features a capacitive touch button, scroll wheel and proximity sensor. This BoosterPack fully demonstrates the benefits of the MSP430G2xx2/G2xx3's Capacitive Touch Sense I/O ports, which allows touch sensors to be directly connected to the MSP430 without any external components! This minimizes physical footprint and bill of materials. FEATURES: Capacitive Touch button, scroll wheel, and proximity sensor 9 on-board LEDs for instant visual feedback Includes MSP430G2452IN20, which is pre-loaded with demo firmware Fully utilizes the MSP430 Capacitive Touch Sense Software Library
item.name: Play with TI's Launchpad/Capacitive Touch Booster Pack
